item.description: [hackme] Download Files the task is from RootersCTF2019 and story goes like this... your client was infected by a really nasty malware and you found some peices of the original malware hidden in the /tmp/dupedive folder. find what this malware left behind ... item.title: [0x002] xvm_001
item.description: [xvm_001] Download Files X3eRo0 recently learned about Virtual-Machine Based protection so he made a little Crackme challenge for you. this VM only has simple opcodes like mov, and, xor. NO JMPs or CALLS. The bytecode literally contains the hint. Crackme : xvm_001 Difficulty : Easy Platform : Linux Points : 4/10 Date : 2020-02-02 Objective : Find the Correct password which gives a '[!
